rules.justification: Only use BEGIN..END to enclose compound statements. -> ignore
Only use BEGIN..END to enclose compound statements. -> ignore
Variable declarations should be ordered by type. -> ignore
Variable 'Text001' must have a suffix from this list: Msg, Tok, Err, Qst, Lbl, Txt. -> ignore
You must specify open and close parenthesis after -> ignore
The record X should be modified before saving to the database. -> ignore
Variable with placeholders should have a comment explaining their content. -> ignore
The Tooltip property must be filled. -> ignore
